bedroom.name: Master Bedroom
bedroom.description: You are in the Master Bedroom that feels worn-out, the air is quiet and a bit musty.

bat.name: Wooden Bat
bat.description: Wooden BAT leaning against the wall
bat.lookAtDescription: You look at it closer... yup it's a bat alright

car key.name: Car Key
car key.lookAtDescription: You look at the keys, you see a faded GM symbol on it

bed.name: Bed
bed.description: an old, creaky BED that has seen better days
bed.lookAtDescription: You look at the bed and see a body shaped indent along with bugs everywhere.... the thought of you sleeping there gives you the shivers

dresser.name: Dresser
dresser.description: A DRESSER sitting in the corner with chipped paint and worn-out handles.

livingroom.name: Living Room
livingroom.description: You find yourself in the living room, a less-than-pleasant sight with faded wallpaper peeling off and untouched dust that likely hasn't been disturbed in years.

couch.name: Couch
couch.description: A dusty old COUCH with a bunch of holes and stains

tv.name: TV Stand
tv.description: A dilapidated TV stand holding an ancient television

rug.name: Rug
rug.description: A worn, RUG with faded intricate patterns sprawls across the creaky wooden floor

library.name: Library
library.description: You are in the library, a place where learning can occur, I wonder if there is anything that I could learn here

books.name: Books
books.lookAtDescription: Taking a closer look, you see one book that looks out of place

book shelf.name: Book shelf
book shelf.description: One creaky wooden BOOK SHELF, full of books

desk.name: Desk
desk.description: Your standard DESK, used for reading and writing.

chair.name: Chair
chair.description: In the corner there is one comfy looking CHAIR that is used for reading

garage.name: Garage
garage.description: You are in the garage, an ancient, dusty space echoing with the creaks of time, where the air carries the scent of old tools.

tools.name: Tools
tools.lookAtDescription: Taking a closer look, you see a bunch of random tools.

gun.name: Gun
gun.description: You spot a GUN on Storage Shelf
gun.lookAtDescription: Taking a closer look, you see an old gun with some bullets in it.

monster.name: Garage Monster
monster.description: A scary MONSTER is in the garage, looking at you with big eyes.

car.name: Car
car.description: An old CAR with worn paint and a hint of rust, taking up space in the garage, I wonder if it still works!

storage shelf.name: Storage Shelf
storage shelf.description: A standard STORAGE SHELF, filled with dusty boxes and forgotten odds and ends, stand quietly against the walls.

toolbox.name: Toolbox
toolbox.description: A well-worn TOOLBOX tucked in the corner, scuffed and well-used, holds a jumble of rusty tools, each with its own tale of fixes and repairs from times gone by.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description: You are in the kitchen, a once cozy hub with worn linoleum floors, a humming refrigerator and a recently disturbed countertop.

knife.name: Knife
knife.lookAtDescription: Taking a closer look, you observe sharpness of the knife, its gleaming blade revealing a history of use and the potential for both danger and utility.

food.name: Food
food.lookAtDescription: Examining it closely, you notice an assortment of edible items, promising a mix of flavors and satisfaction.

refrigerator.name: Refrigerator
refrigerator.description: Standard REFRIGERATOR with a few dents and magnets holding pictures on the door.

drawers.name: Drawers
drawers.description: All the DRAWERS look like your run of the mill kitchen drawers, except one that looks like it was left ajar.

entrance.name: Entrance
entrance.description: You are at the Entrance of the house and the door is locked.

house key.name: House Key
house key.description: A crucial HOUSE KEY that holds the promise of unlocking the exit, your potential escape from the haunted house.
house key.lookAtDescription: Upon closer inspection, the house key appears ordinary yet holds the potential to reveal secrets as it gleams in the dim light.

side table.name: Side Table
side table.description: A simple SIDE TABLE, weathered by time and use, standing unassumingly with subtle marks and memories etched into its surface

door.name: Front Entrance
door.description: Portal to freedom.... if we could get out.
